text: Gloria Fuertes García (28 July 1917 – 27 November 1998) was a Spanish poet and author of children's literature. She became particularly well-known in Spain in the 70’s, after her collaborations on children’s television shows. In her work, she defended equality between men and women, pacifism and the fight for the environment. he recognition of her role in Spanish poetry as a whole during the 20th century has increased greatly.
